title: The Two paths
brief_description: Short drama about two sisters with two very different personalities, one frivolous and the other sensible, and the path they each take in their lives. Cast includes Dorothy Bernard, Wilfred Lucas, Adolph Lestina, Clara T. Bracy, Linda Arvidson, Florence Barker. Silent film with English intertitles.
